for testcases in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n = int(raw_input() )
    Dic = {}
    for i in xrange(n) :
        user, score = map(str, raw_input().split())
        Dic[user] = score
   
    Scores = list( Dic.values() )
    ans = 0
    for point in Scores :
        ans += 1 if point == '+' else (-1)
    print ans
